suncertify.utils
Class FilenameComboBox

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.utils.SmartComboBox
      suncertify.utils.FilenameComboBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class FilenameComboBox
extends SmartComboBox

Combo box decorator for an editable combo box that will be used to enter filenames. We generate a list of possible matching filenames (names of files and folders) as the user types. Folders are indicated by forward slashes or backslashes. The list of matches for the current folder is displayed neatly underneath the slash. The setSuffix method provides some control over which filenames will be included in the list of matches.

See Also:
Serialized Form

public void setSuffix(java.lang.String suffix)
Set the suffix that each filename must end with in order to be included in the match list.

Parameters:

getSuffix

public java.lang.String getSuffix()
Get the suffix that each filename must end with in order to be included in the match list.

Returns:
the current suffix

getOffsetForMatchList

protected int getOffsetForMatchList(java.lang.String editorText)
Get the horizontal position where the list of matches should appear, measured in characters. For example, returning editorText.length() would make the match list appear immediately after the editor text. Subclasses should override this to display the list in the correct position.

Overrides:
getOffsetForMatchList in class SmartComboBox
Parameters:
editorText - the current editor text
Returns:
the spacing from the left of the combo box to the left of the match list (measured in characters)

getMatchingItems

protected java.lang.Object[] getMatchingItems(java.lang.String stringToMatch)
Get a list of items that match the current text. By default we just check for items that begin with the string to match. A subclass might override this method to do something more complex, such as looking for items that contain the string to match.

Overrides:
getMatchingItems in class SmartComboBox
Parameters:
stringToMatch - the string to find matches for
Returns:
list of combo box items that match stringToMatch
